description: Describes the available directories that are registered with Amazon WorkSpaces.

parameters.name: DirectoryIds
parameters.description: The identifiers of the directories. If the value is null, all directories are retrieved. (string) ---

parameters.name: WorkspaceDirectoryNames
parameters.description: The names of the WorkSpace directories. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filter condition for the WorkSpaces. (dict) --- Describes the filter conditions for the WorkSpaces to return. The name of the WorkSpaces to filter. The values for filtering WorkSpaces (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the WorkSpaces to filter.

nested_items.name: Directories
nested_items.description: Information about the directories.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: The directory identifier.

nested_items.name: Alias
nested_items.description: The directory alias.

nested_items.name: DirectoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the directory.

nested_items.name: RegistrationCode
nested_items.description: The registration code for the directory. This is the code that users enter in their Amazon WorkSpaces client application to connect to the directory.

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: The identifiers of the subnets used with the directory.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DnsIpAddresses
nested_items.description: The IP addresses of the DNS servers for the directory.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CustomerUserName
nested_items.description: The user name for the service account.

nested_items.name: IamRoleId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the IAM role. This is the role that allows Amazon WorkSpaces to make calls to other services, such as Amazon EC2, on your behalf.

nested_items.name: DirectoryType
nested_items.description: The directory type.

nested_items.name: WorkspaceSecurityGroupId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the security group that is assigned to new WorkSpaces.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the directory's registration with Amazon WorkSpaces. After a directory is deregistered, the DEREGISTERED state is returned very briefly before the directory metadata is cleaned up, so this state is rarely returned. To confirm that a directory is deregistered, check for the directory ID by using DescribeWorkspaceDirectories. If the directory ID isn't returned, then the directory has been successfully deregistered.

nested_items.name: WorkspaceCreationProperties
nested_items.description: The default creation properties for all WorkSpaces in the directory.

nested_items.name: EnableInternetAccess
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to automatically assign an Elastic public IP address to WorkSpaces in this directory by default. If enabled, the Elastic public IP address allows outbound internet access from your WorkSpaces when you're using an internet gateway in the Amazon VPC in which your WorkSpaces are located. If you're using a Network Address Translation (NAT) gateway for outbound internet access from your VPC, or if your WorkSpaces are in public subnets and you manually assign them Elastic IP addresses, you should disable this setting. This setting applies to new WorkSpaces that you launch or to existing WorkSpaces that you rebuild. For more information, see Configure a VPC for Amazon WorkSpaces.

nested_items.name: DefaultOu
nested_items.description: The organizational unit (OU) in the directory for the WorkSpace machine accounts.

nested_items.name: CustomSecurityGroupId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the default security group to apply to WorkSpaces when they are created. For more information, see Security Groups for Your WorkSpaces.

nested_items.name: UserEnabledAsLocalAdministrator
nested_items.description: Specifies whether WorkSpace users are local administrators on their WorkSpaces.

nested_items.name: EnableMaintenanceMode
nested_items.description: Specifies whether maintenance mode is enabled for WorkSpaces. For more information, see WorkSpace Maintenance.

nested_items.name: InstanceIamRoleArn
nested_items.description: Indicates the IAM role ARN of the instance.

nested_items.name: ipGroupIds
nested_items.description: The identifiers of the IP access control groups associated with the directory.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: WorkspaceAccessProperties
nested_items.description: The devices and operating systems that users can use to access WorkSpaces.

nested_items.name: DeviceTypeWindows
nested_items.description: Indicates whether users can use Windows clients to access their WorkSpaces.

nested_items.name: DeviceTypeOsx
nested_items.description: Indicates whether users can use macOS clients to access their WorkSpaces.

nested_items.name: DeviceTypeWeb
nested_items.description: Indicates whether users can access their WorkSpaces through a web browser.

nested_items.name: DeviceTypeIos
nested_items.description: Indicates whether users can use iOS devices to access their WorkSpaces.

nested_items.name: DeviceTypeAndroid
nested_items.description: Indicates whether users can use Android and Android-compatible Chrome OS devices to access their WorkSpaces.

nested_items.name: DeviceTypeChromeOs
nested_items.description: Indicates whether users can use Chromebooks to access their WorkSpaces.

nested_items.name: DeviceTypeZeroClient
nested_items.description: Indicates whether users can use zero client devices to access their WorkSpaces.

nested_items.name: DeviceTypeLinux
nested_items.description: Indicates whether users can use Linux clients to access their WorkSpaces.

nested_items.name: DeviceTypeWorkSpacesThinClient
nested_items.description: Indicates whether users can access their WorkSpaces through a WorkSpaces Thin Client.

nested_items.name: AccessEndpointConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies the configuration for accessing the WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: AccessEndpoints
nested_items.description: Indicates a list of access endpoints associated with this directory.

nested_items.name: AccessEndpointType
nested_items.description: Indicates the type of access endpoint.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpointId
nested_items.description: Indicates the VPC endpoint to use for access.

nested_items.name: InternetFallbackProtocols
nested_items.description: Indicates a list of protocols that fallback to using the public Internet when streaming over a VPC endpoint is not available.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Tenancy
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the directory is dedicated or shared. To use Bring Your Own License (BYOL), this value must be set to DEDICATED. For more information, see Bring Your Own Windows Desktop Images.

nested_items.name: SelfservicePermissions
nested_items.description: The default self-service permissions for WorkSpaces in the directory.

nested_items.name: RestartWorkspace
nested_items.description: Specifies whether users can restart their WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: IncreaseVolumeSize
nested_items.description: Specifies whether users can increase the volume size of the drives on their WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: ChangeComputeType
nested_items.description: Specifies whether users can change the compute type (bundle) for their WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: SwitchRunningMode
nested_items.description: Specifies whether users can switch the running mode of their WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: RebuildWorkspace
nested_items.description: Specifies whether users can rebuild the operating system of a WorkSpace to its original state.

nested_items.name: SamlProperties
nested_items.description: Describes the enablement status, user access URL, and relay state parameter name that are used for configuring federation with an SAML 2.0 identity provider.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of SAML 2.0 authentication. These statuses include the following.
If the setting is DISABLED, end users will be directed to login with their directory credentials.

If the setting is ENABLED, end users will be directed to login via the user access URL. Users attempting to connect to WorkSpaces from a client application that does not support SAML 2.0 authentication will not be able to connect.

If the setting is ENABLED_WITH_DIRECTORY_LOGIN_FALLBACK, end users will be directed to login via the user access URL on supported client applications, but will not prevent clients that do not support SAML 2.0 authentication from connecting as if SAML 2.0 authentication was disabled.

nested_items.name: UserAccessUrl
nested_items.description: The SAML 2.0 identity provider (IdP) user access URL is the URL a user would navigate to in their web browser in order to federate from the IdP and directly access the application, without any SAML 2.0 service provider (SP) bindings.

nested_items.name: RelayStateParameterName
nested_items.description: The relay state parameter name supported by the SAML 2.0 identity provider (IdP). When the end user is redirected to the user access URL from the WorkSpaces client application, this relay state parameter name is appended as a query parameter to the URL along with the relay state endpoint to return the user to the client application session.

nested_items.name: CertificateBasedAuthProperties
nested_items.description: The certificate-based authentication properties used to authenticate SAML 2.0 Identity Provider (IdP) user identities to Active Directory for WorkSpaces login.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the certificate-based authentication properties.

nested_items.name: CertificateAuthorityArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services Certificate Manager Private CA resource.

nested_items.name: EndpointEncryptionMode
nested_items.description: Endpoint encryption mode that allows you to configure the specified directory between Standard TLS and FIPS 140-2 validated mode.

nested_items.name: MicrosoftEntraConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies details about Microsoft Entra configurations.

nested_items.name: TenantId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the tenant.

nested_items.name: ApplicationConfigSecretArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the application config.

nested_items.name: WorkspaceDirectoryName
nested_items.description: The name fo the WorkSpace directory.

nested_items.name: WorkspaceDirectoryDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the WorkSpace directory.

nested_items.name: UserIdentityType
nested_items.description: Indicates the identity type of the specifired user.

nested_items.name: WorkspaceType
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the directory's WorkSpace type is personal or pools.

nested_items.name: IDCConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies details about identity center configurations.

nested_items.name: InstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the identity center instance.

nested_items.name: ApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the application.

nested_items.name: ActiveDirectoryConfig
nested_items.description: Information about the Active Directory config.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The name of the domain.

nested_items.name: ServiceAccountSecretArn
nested_items.description: Indicates the secret ARN on the service account.

nested_items.name: StreamingProperties
nested_items.description: The streaming properties to configure.

nested_items.name: StreamingExperiencePreferredProtocol
nested_items.description: Indicates the type of preferred protocol for the streaming experience.

nested_items.name: UserSettings
nested_items.description: Indicates the permission settings asscoiated with the user.

nested_items.name: Action
nested_items.description: Indicates the type of action.

nested_items.name: Permission
nested_items.description: Indicates if the setting is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: MaximumLength
nested_items.description: Indicates the maximum character length for the specified user setting.

nested_items.name: StorageConnectors
nested_items.description: Indicates the storage connector used.

nested_items.name: ConnectorType
nested_items.description: The type of connector used to save user files.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates if the storage connetor is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: GlobalAccelerator
nested_items.description: Indicates the Global Accelerator properties.

nested_items.name: Mode
nested_items.description: Indicates if Global Accelerator for directory is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: PreferredProtocol
nested_items.description: Indicates the preferred protocol for Global Accelerator.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message returned.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
